about_the_game:
One chorus theme song of the game "How to Take Off Your Mask". All music files are in mp3 format, 256kbps.

Additional Files

1. "Take Off Your Mask" Lyric (pdf file, including the Japanese lyric alphabetically, translations in English and German, and lyric in Japanese Letters)

2. Readme

Credit

Song: Kuyuri

Lyric: kikyow
Music: Souichi Sakagami
English Translation: Chu-3/Regitze Lundgreen
German Translation: Marcel Weyers
